narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Allina Health System is a Ambulance provider based in Saint Paul, MN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $118.0M in Medicaid payments across 503K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $118.0M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,752 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
